title: AR-Based STEM Fundamental Concepts Exploration Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented learning using smartphone-based AR applications, combining offline meetings with online assignments, and providing immediate feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Explain the basic components (current, voltage, resistance) and operating principles of electrical circuits through AR simulations.
Physically assemble sensor circuits (e.g., LDR/thermistor) using an AR-based electronic kit and integrate them with virtual elements.

Learners Can Create Two AR Contents Visually and Interactively Representing Three STEM Concepts (e.g., Molecular Structures, Mechanical Principles) Using AR Development Tools (e.g., CoSpaces, Unity) in Blended Environments and Achieve ≥4/5 on Peer/Instructor Evaluation Criteria (Creativity, Functionality, Accuracy)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
